EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Email Hirect
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome To Hirect..!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Welcome to Hirect! We are glad to have you in the Hirect Ecosystem, your one-stop solution to hire the best talent from a pool of over 3M+ registered and verified candidates.
Your profile on Hirect has been created successfully. You can keep an eye out here for our new offerings. We will keep you updated. Hirect looks forward to helping you.
Best Wishes Team Hirect.
